law.catch_line: Any credit grantor may, subject to the other provisions of this subtitle:...

text.section:
Any credit grantor may, subject to the other provisions of this subtitle:
Offer and extend credit under a revolving credit plan to a borrower and in that connection charge and collect the interest, finance charges, and other charges permitted by this subtitle;
Take any security as collateral as may be acceptable to the credit grantor.
If real property is taken as security, the credit grantor shall record the entire line of credit when the credit plan is established.
